alert.note: Alert for Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:36PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. Northwest winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Republic County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The wintry conditions are likely to impact holiday travel late tonight and Christmas morning.
info.instruction: Motorists should remain alert to changing weather conditions, and take precautions if travel is necessary. A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
